result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Arraignment on November 14, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Arraignment on November 14, 2022 at 11:30 am.

1:06 PM Defendant Woody NMI Bird Sr in court, in custody from Stanley Correctional Facility.  Attorney Renee M Taber in court for Woody NMI Bird Sr.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances.   Attny Taber indicates to proceed with preliminary hearing.    State calls witness, Sawyer County Deputy Hartling, sworn in by court.   State begins examination.   1:09 AM  Witness identified the DEF,  Attny Taber no objection. Court indicates the record will reflect.  State continues examination.   1:13 AM  Cross-Examination by Attorney Taber.  1:16 PM Attny Taber no further questions.  1:16 PM  Re-direct by State.   1:16 PM  Witness excused.   No further witness by either party.  State request for bind over.  Attny Taber no argument.  Court finds probable cause and binds defendant over for trial.   DEF to appear by zoom for arraignment.
Arraignment scheduled for September 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Arraignment on September 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 10:04 AM Defendant Woody NMI Bird Sr appeared by video, in custody in Stanley Correctional Facility.  Attorney Renee M Taber in court for Woody NMI Bird Sr. Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin. Court calls case and recites appearances. DEF received copy of criminal complaint in court on this date.  DEF verifies DOB and address. Defendant advised of rights/penalties, acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading of complaint.  Court enters NG Plea to Count 2 and 3.  Bond Continues.  Attny Taber request to set for preliminary hearing, but waives times limits for preliminary hearing.   DEF agrees to appear by video for preliminary hearing.

10:45 AM Defendant Woody NMI Bird not in court, DEF in custody in Stanley Correctional Facility.  Attorney Bruce Robert Poquette in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney John E Swanberg in court for Woody NMI Bird.  Attny Swanberg indicates arrangements made for DEF to appear from Stanley, DEF not on zoom.  Court reset.  Attny Swanberg to make arrangements.
Initial appearance scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.
